channel.title: Demos on Jenkins X
channel.description: Recent content in Demos on Jenkins X

item.title: Articles
item.description: Jenkins X: Preview Environment by Michal Foksa, January 10th, 2019 Continuous Delivery with Amazon EKS and Jenkins X by Henryk Konsek, 7th November, 2018 Trying out Jenkins X on Azure Kubernetes Service(AKS) by PC Chan on October 29th, 2018 SetUp Jenkins X on Minikube kubernetes Cluster by mayank verma on September 30th, 2018 Installing Jenkins X on IBM Cloud Kubernetes Service on August 28th, 2018 by Ram Vennam Jenkins X and Pivotal PKS on 1st August, 2018 by Roie Ben-haim Accelerate with Jenkins X by James Rawlings on July 20, 2018 Add CI/CD to Your Spring Boot App with Jenkins X and Kubernetes by Matt Raible on July 11, 2018 Don’t Install Developer Tools!

item.title: Talks and Conferences
item.description: 2019-05-07 Workshop: Continuous Deployment To Kubernetes at Craft (Budapest) by Viktor Farcic 2019-03-19 Jenkins X - Continuously Driving the Kloud (German) at Javaland 2019 (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-01-24 Jenkins X - Continuously Driving the Kloud (German) at JUG Metroplregion Nürnberg (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-01-14 Jenkins X - Continuously Driving the Kloud (German) at DevOps Meetup Würzburg (Germany) by Gerd Aschemann 2019-02-01 Continuous Deployment with Jenkins X, Kubernetes, and Friends at Fosdem, Brussels by Viktor Farcic

item.title: Create Cluster
item.description: This demo creates a new kubernetes cluster using these commands in parallel: jx create cluster gke jx create cluster aks jx create cluster minikube

item.title: Create Cluster GKE
item.description: This demo uses the jx create cluster gke command to create a new kubernetes cluster:

item.title: Create Spring
item.description: This demo uses the jx create spring command to create a new Spring Boot application with CI / CD pipelines with GitOps promotions:

item.title: Docker Image CVE Scanning
item.description: There is a blog on Announcing CVE docker image analysis with Anchore You can watch the video here

item.title: KubeCon 2018 Demo
item.description: Here is the video of a talk by James Strachan: Jenkins X: Easy CI/CD for Kubernetes at KubeCon Europe 2018. You can also get the slides from this talk here

item.title: DevOxx UK 2018 Demo
item.description: Here is the video of a talk by James Strachan: Jenkins X: Continuous Delivery for Kubernetes at DevOxx UK, 2018. You can also get the slides from this talk here
